Name: ROTA
About the game: ROTA is a gravity bending puzzle platforming adventure! A new game brought to you by the creator of Tiny Crate. Rotate gravity as you walk over the edge! Push, pull and rotate gravity-blocks to traverse the stage and solve puzzles. Collect all 50 gems to unlock doors and explore 8 vibrant worlds! Listen to an original ambient soundtrack that will keep you relaxed while solving challenging puzzles. (: Watch out for spikes! 0:
